name: Cika
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the luck always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah... idk what i want to say
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: i hope ur dreams and ambition will come true cik, especially ur study mwhehee.
outroSmiley: and i'll wait till we meet soon
